meanings.definition: Not using or taking words in their usual or most basic sense.
meanings.sent1: The nonliteral meaning of the story was hard to understand.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the nonliteral artwork that used abstract shapes.
meanings.sent3: The nonliteral description of the monster made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His nonliteral interpretation of the poem added depth to the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The nonliteral language painted a vivid picture in my mind.

meanings.definition: Not representing something in a strict or accurate way.
meanings.sent1: The nonliteral representation of the character confused the audience.
meanings.sent2: The artist used nonliteral colors to create a dreamy atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The nonliteral map made it look like the city was in a different country.
meanings.sent4: Her nonliteral explanation of the concept sparked a new idea.
meanings.sent5: The nonliteral image stuck in my mind long after I saw it.
